thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 8 of 1767
thread.title: Nicole

author: Nicole
title: Nicole
text: This is my second booking, after making an error in our flight reservation. I noticed my error 48 hours after booking, and had to call the cancel our original reservation. Fortunately, they were able to cancel it, BUT not without charging $75/pass. The airline policy was no refund/cancellation, but the FlightHub agent was able to go through her supervisor to help with the cancellation. I wish it was a less expensive mistake!
